entry.title: Optimizing The Image Element LCP
entry.summary: Largest Contentful Paint (or LCP) is a major web performance KPI which is still a new concept for many web developers since it became a ranking factor just recently. In this article, Eloïse Martin provides an overview of the best practices for the integration and optimization of an LCP image.

entry.summary: In this article, I'm going to show you how to build a real-time chat app using React.js and Firebase. In the app, we will allow the user to log in with their Google account using Firebase's Google sign-in Authentication. We will also store and retrieve all the chatroom messages

entry.title: Coalesce SQL – Example PostgreSQL and SQL Server Functions
entry.summary: In SQL, the COALESCE() function returns the first non-null value in an entry. It evaluates the values of the entries one by one, ignores the null values, then returns the first value that is not null. It works in PostgreSQL, SQL server, and MySQL. In this article, I will show

entry.summary: In this article, Ruslan Yevych will show you an easy way how to predict the appearance of a problem known as WCAG Failure Under 1.4.4 Resize Text (AA) while zooming the page. entry.title: Deploying CSS Logical Properties On Web Apps
entry.summary: You may have already heard of CSS logical properties or RTL adaptations but are still deciding whether to deploy them widely.
